name: GAMEnator
short_description:
At first, this is already IN PROGRESS.
(our vision is even bigger, mentioned in brackets).

One source - to Many platforms -> PC, Web Browsers, Smart Phones, Tablets, (Consoles).
Just one click to publish your game for Windows, Linux, Android, HTML5, (iOS, ...)

Easily combine 2D and 3D.
(Easy to make multiplayer games.)

Editor for general game development.
Specialized editor for Point-and-click adventures.

You can develop games on Windows, Linux, (iOS).

Level editor integrated in game.

Focus on performance.
Based on C++, OpenGL.
summary: Game engine for any game genre, every platform, many operating systems

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
